text: The Puerto Rico women's national under-18 and under-19 basketball team, is controlled by the Puerto Rican Basketball Federation (), abbreviated as FBPUR, and represents Puerto Rico in international under-18 and under-19 (under age 18 and under age 19) women's basketball competitions.FIBA National Federations – Puerto Rico, fiba.com, accessed 14 July 2016. ==See also== * Puerto Rico national basketball team * Puerto Rico national under-19 basketball team * Puerto Rico women's national basketball team ==References== ==External links== * Puerto Rico Basketball Federation under Category:Women's national under-19 basketball teams
title: Puerto Rico women's national under-19 basketball team
